China's 2023 bank lending at record high, but economy still strugglingNew bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:26:26 GMT B26ZCDHZ3FKGTKLJVXURHTWL5Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-2023-bank-lending-record-high-economy-still-struggling-2024-01-12/Judy Hua, Kevin Yao市场亚洲市场
In moon race with China, U.S. setbacks test role of private firmsTwo U.S. setbacks this week in the race to the moon with China illustrate the risks of NASA's plans to bet on a new strategy of relying heavily on private companies. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:08:41 GMT 2BACK DUZM5RPNVLCZLCTSE6M https://www.reuters.com/science/moon-race-with-china-us-setbacks-test-role-of-private-firms-2024-01-12/Joey Roulette, Nivedita Bhattacharjee, Ryan Woo科学
Morning Bid: Crude shrugs at Yemen strikes, banks reportA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:06:40 GMT DCYD2H46HJIBREGDWSB3ISNSRQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-01-12/Reuters市场美国市场
Exclusive: Shein files with Chinese regulator for planned US float -sourcesFashion company Shein is seeking Beijing's nod to go public in the U.S., two sources with knowledge of the matter said, a decision which could delay its float plans and comes despite efforts to distance itself from China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:20:41 GMT LTZHYAIOVZNIFNTMD46KOXW6WM https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/shein-files-with-chinese-regulator-planned-us-float-sources-2024-01-12/Julie Zhu, Anirban Sen商业零售与消费品
Exclusive: EU investigators to inspect China's BYD, Geely and SAIC in EV probe - sourceEuropean Commission investigators are to inspect Chinese automakers in the coming weeks as part of a probe into whether to impose punitive tariffs to protect European electric vehicle (EV) makers, three people involved in the process said. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 09:57:12 GMT QECIHIFABFOKTHWPRGT5P3CLYE https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/eu-investigators-inspect-chinas-bid-geely-saic-ev-probe-source-2024-01-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Porsche increases 2023 deliveries despite China slumpLuxury carmaker Porsche increased its deliveries by 3% in 2023, with 320,221 vehicles delivered worldwide, as growth in Europe and North America offset a challenging market in China, the company said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 08:03:15 GMT EHGNPJEBVNMV7L4I62RJV5FZPY https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/porsche-increases-2023-deliveries-despite-china-slump-2024-01-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
